author: Simon Carswell, Conor Gallagher
title: Coronavirus: Motorists must slow down to avoid overburdening hospitals – RSA
description: Motorists should avoiding speeding amid reduced road congestion during the coronavirus pandemic to shield overburdened hospitals from road traffic incidents, Road Safety Authority chairwoman Liz O’Donnell said. Ms O’Donnell said that there has been anecdotal …
content:
Motorists should avoiding speeding amid reduced road congestion during the coronavirus pandemic to shield overburdened hospitals from road traffic incidents, Road Safety Authority chairwoman Liz ODonnell said.
